Detailed Description

A popup arrowpanel that can be used to display ListWidget and ExpandableListWidget for content.

The popup arrowpanel is a floating container that appears on top of the current activity.

    MyClickListener::MyClickListener(Page* page)
        : OnClickListener(page)
    {
           mpage = page;
    }

    MyClickListener::~MyClickListener()
    {
           GLOGENTRY();
    }

    void MyClickListener::onClick(Widget* v)
    {
          switch(v->getId())
          {
            case 100:
              if(!mPopupArrowPanel->isShow()) {
                  // Show PopupArrowPanel
                  mPopupArrowPanel->showAsDropDown(v, 0, 0);
              } else {
                  // Close PopupArrowPanel
                  mPopupArrowPanel->dismiss();
              }
          }
    }

    void EmptyPageTest::onInit(Persistence* const p)
    {
           MyClickListener* listener = new MyClickListener(this);
           mpBtn1 = new Button(this);
           mpBtn1->setId(100);
           mpBtn1->setText();
           mpBtn1->setOnClickListener(listener);
           mpCtrl = new LinearController(this);
           mpCtrl->setId(102);
           mpCtrl->addWidget(mpBtn1);

           gaia::base::StringArray instringArray(6);
           instringArray.replaceAt("Stop", 0);
           instringArray.replaceAt("Folder", 1);
           instringArray.replaceAt("Sort", 2);
           instringArray.replaceAt("Filters", 3);
           instringArray.replaceAt("New meeting invitation", 4);
           instringArray.replaceAt("New account", 5);

           // Create a PopupArrowPanel and set a content into it.
           mPopupArrowPanel = new gaia::ui::PopupArrowPanel(mPage);
           mPopupArrowPanel->setIndicatorPosition(PopupArrowPanel::TOP);
           mPopupArrowPanel->setSize(ControllerParams::MATCH_PARENT,ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT);
           Button *mpBtn = new Button(this);
           mpBtn->setText("This is PopupArrowPanel");
           mPopupArrowPanel->setItemList(instringArray);

           mScene->attachController(mpCtrl);
           mScene->setupSceneLayout();
    }

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
TOP 

/\ |----------------| | | | | | |-->ArrowPanelHeight | | | | |----------------| ArrowPanelWidth

Direction of arrow aligns a popup's top edge, default arrow'location is in center of edge.

BOTTOM 

|----------------| | | | | | |-->ArrowPanelHeight | | |ArrowPanelWidth | |----------------| \/ Direction of arrow aligns a popup's down edge.

default arrow'location is in center of edge.

RIGHT 

|----------------| | |->ArrowPanelHeight | | | |\ | |/ |ArrowPanelWidth | |----------------|

Direction of arrow aligns a popup's right edge. default arrow'location is in center of edge.

LEFT 

|----------------| | | | | /| | \| |->ArrowPanelHeight | | |ArrowPanelWidth | |----------------|

Direction of arrow aligns a popup's left edge. default arrow'location is in center of edge.

Definition at line 101 of file PopupArrowPanel.h.

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
LISTPOPUP 

When your want to use the ListWidget to be a content into PopupArrowPanel, should choose LISTPOPUP mode.

EXPANDLISTPOPUP 

When your want to use the ExpandableListWidget to be a content into PopupArrowPanel, should choose EXPANDLISTPOPUP mode.

void gaia::ui::PopupArrowPanel::showAsDropDown ( gaia::core::Widget *  anchor,
int32_t  xoff,
int32_t  yoff 
)

Display the content widget in a PopupArrowPanel anchored to the bottom-left corner of the anchor widget.

If there is not enough room on screen to show the popup in its entirety, this method tries to find a parent scroll widget to scroll. If no parent scroll widget can be scrolled, the bottom-left corner of the popup is pinned at the top left corner of the anchor widget.

Parameters:
anchorthe widget on which to pin the PopupArrowPanel
xoffthe popup's x location offset
yoffthe popup's y location offset
